name: 4Fun - Funny Video, Live Chat & Make Friends
description: Indias funny videos app for watching videos, live chat and making friends.   Funny Videos and Status Videos App 4Fun is a free video community. It is available in 10 languages. You can discover funny Indian videos on 4Fun. You can express yourself by watching videos from people, sharing status videos. You can become popular in India, you also can make friends, share videos and chat with people.    Original videos editor app 4Fun is a simple video editor to trim videos and add text, stickers, filters, music, and songs. You can easily create and upload your music videos. You can become popular by creating and uploading short videos on 4Fun. You also can get your followers, share and free chat with users.    Free video download 4Fun provides free videos for you to download, including funny videos and status videos.   Free live chat app In 4Fun, you can choose friends you like and make live chat with them.  It is quick, easy and free to start a live chat with strangers and make friends.With 4fun, Stranger chat will become easily.    Key Features  - Watch 10 Indian language videos - Download Indian video status in your native language - Create your status, and share to friends - Edit video with effects, filters, music, stickers and text - Free live chat with stranger   Video Edit Features  - Trim your videos in your native language, create video in a minute. - Add music to videos, make your own music videos. - Make your photo videos, you can add music and text on your photos. - Edit videos with sepcial and user-friendly video effects which include stickers, filters, songs, themes, frames and other video effects. - Upload short funny videos, edit them with cool filters and effects.   Protect your Information - Your private information will be protected by 4Fun and not shared with others. - Except the information on your profile page, no other will be seen by other users.   What are you waiting for? Download & join 4Fun now.  We will appreciate you if you give feedback to us. Please report bugs or give suggestions to us. Lets make 4Fun a better community together! Please contact us at feedback@4funindia.com, If you have any questions. Business cooperation : bd@4funindia.com  Enjoy!
